trans-unit.source: Next, you must change the way that push notifications are registered to make sure that the user is authenticated before registration is attempted.
trans-unit.target: Next, you must change the way that push notifications are registered to make sure that the user is authenticated before registration is attempted.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio in Solution Explorer, open the app.xaml.cs project file and in the **Application_Launching** event handler comment-out or delete the call to the **AcquirePushChannel** method.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio in Solution Explorer, open the app.xaml.cs project file and in the **Application_Launching** event handler comment-out or delete the call to the **AcquirePushChannel** method.

trans-unit.source: Change the accessibility of the **AcquirePushChannel** method from `private` to `public` and add the `static` modifier.
trans-unit.target: Change the accessibility of the **AcquirePushChannel** method from `private` to `public` and add the `static` modifier.

trans-unit.source: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs project file and replace the **OnNavigatedTo** method override with the following:
trans-unit.target: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs project file and replace the **OnNavigatedTo** method override with the following:
